main event: An observer reported a bright light in New Rochelle, New York, on 9/6/1952, which appeared to be circling and passing over a building.
interesting points: The object was described as brighter than a star,The observer reported no sound associated with the object,The color of the object was noted as white,It was suggested that the object might possibly be an aircraft with landing lights,There are indications of previous similar sightings in the area.
witness description: an observer who saw the bright light
